analyses.summary: Prediction markets show extreme certainty for Gold prices and significant bearish sentiment on Brazilian economic indicators. Other sectors show high uncertainty.

signals.rationale: Markets overwhelmingly predict Gold will close above $4000, indicating strong bullish momentum and expected price appreciation.
key_events: Gold close above $4000 at end of 2025

signals.rationale: Strong conviction that Brazil's unemployment will remain above 6.3% for Q4 2025, suggesting an unfavorable economic outlook.
High probability that Brazil's 12-month inflation will exceed 5.50% in December 2025, indicating inflationary pressures.
Markets assign very high probability to 4-6 successful SpaceX Starship launches, signaling positive developments in space exploration technology.
key_events: 4-6 SpaceX Starship launches successfully reach Space in 2025

signals.rationale: Low confidence in US revenue collection being below $100b; current probabilities suggest this is unlikely to materialize.
key_events: US collect less than $100b in revenue in 2025

analyses.summary: Market data for 2026 shows extremely low probabilities across all prediction markets. No clear trends or high-conviction signals emerge for actionable trading.

signals.rationale: Low probability of winning the Stanley Cup suggests no actionable trading signal.
